scripts.clean: npm run clean:nodemodules & npm run clean:dist
scripts.testgh: mkdir gh && echo "Test" > gh/index.html && gh-pages -d gh -r https://${GH_TOKEN}@github.com/ngx-rapid/ngx-rapid.github.io.git -b master -g $npm_package_version
scripts.publish:ci: lerna publish --repo-version=`node -pe "require('./lerna.json').version"` --skip-git --force-publish=* --yes && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run deploy
scripts.publish:prerelease: lerna publish --cd-version=prerelease --force-publish=* --yes && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run deploy
scripts.publish:patch: lerna publish --cd-version=patch --force-publish=* --yes && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run deploy
scripts.publish:minor: lerna publish --cd-version=minor --force-publish=* --yes && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run deploy
scripts.publish:major: lerna publish --cd-version=major --force-publish=* --yes && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run deploy
